title: Generic-Index
description: This scheme defines how index configurations are to be defined. These index definitions support both Elastic and Graph-DB

MetadataSpecification.description: Contains several fields to define the specifics of the grid

MetadataSpecificationType.description: This object requires any metadata record that is validated by this schema to provide information about the schema.

URL.description: This element represents the URL where the schema lives. The schema can be downloaded.

Name.description: This element represents the name of the schema.

Version.description: This element represents the version of the schema.

IndexType.description: Define one index that needs to be created

Field.description: The Field to index, defined as a jq style path

Type.description: target index software to host the index

Name.description: The name to give the index within the index server

Indexer.description: The name of the function in code that will generate the index for this field

Configuration.decription: Any valid JSON can be defined here and it will be passed to the indexer as a configuration for this specific index
